name: GKRule
desc: A rule to be used in the context of a rule system, with a predicate to be tested and an action to be executed when the test succeeds.

items.name: init(predicate: NSPredicate, assertingFact: NSObjectProtocol, grade: Float)
items.desc: Creates a data-driven rule with the specified predicate, whose action asserts a fact in the rule system evaluating the rule.

items.name: init(predicate: NSPredicate, retractingFact: NSObjectProtocol, grade: Float)
items.desc: Creates a data-driven rule with the specified predicate, whose action retracts a fact in the rule system evaluating the rule.

items.name: init(blockPredicate: (GKRuleSystem) -> Bool, action: (GKRuleSystem) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a rule whose predicate is evaluated and action is executed through the specified blocks.

items.name: func performAction(in: GKRuleSystem)
